Package org.mmbase.bridge.forms

Class Summary
Form This NodeManager represents a generic form.
FormNode A test/example form that deals with nodes of the type 'aa'.
FormsCloud This Cloud implementation manages a bunch of Forms.
FormsCloudContext The CloudContext which manages a bunch of 'forms'.
FormsCloudContext.Resolver  
FormsTransaction  
NodeWrapperForm You can also only specify the Node implementation in the 'builder' xml, it will then by FormsCloud be wrapped into an instance of this class.
 

Exception Summary
NotWrapped Exceptions of this type can be thrown by the constructor of FormNode extension to indicate to NodeWrapperForm that we don't want to wrap a given Node.
